Literature.Title: A Leu-Lys-rich antimicrobial peptide: activity and mechanism.
Literature.Author: Park Y, Lee DG, Jang SH, Woo ER, Jeong HG, Choi CH, Hahm KS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1918(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 3096(MIC=6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=3.12µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=1.56µM),Candida albicans TIMM 1768(MIC=12.5µM),Trichosporon beigelii KCTC 7707(MIC=6.25-12.5µM)
